data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Dated 04Th August, 2023
data.news_body: Outcome of board meeting dated 04th August, 2023

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30, 33 and Schedule III (Part A) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosures) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the meeting of the Board of Directors held on 04th August, 2023, which commenced at 5.00 P.M. and concluded at 8.00 P.M. has inter-alia approved The Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company and the Limited Review Reports (Standalone and Consolidated) for the first quarter ended on 30th June, 2023 and Recommended to shareholder for their approval for raising of fund upto Rupees Three Hundred Crore, in one or more tranches, on such terms and conditions as it may deem fit, by way of issuance of Securities, through one or more permissible mode(s) including but not limited to a private placement, preferential issue, qualified institutions placement, follow-on public offering or a combination thereof, subject to shareholders' approval and regulatory and other approvals, as may be required under applicable laws.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and sub-para 15(b) of Para A of Part A of Schedule III of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and with reference to our letter dated 27th May, 2023, we hereby inform that the audio/video recording of the Business Update Video Conferencing Call held on Friday, June 05, 2023 on Company's financial performance for Q4 and FYE 2022-23 is made available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Investor Presentation
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR), Regulations 2015, please find enclosed a copy of Investor Presentation on the financial performance of the Company for Q4 and FYE 2022-2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 46(2)(oa) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and with reference to our letter dated 15th May, 2023, we hereby inform that the audio recording of the Company's Investor/Analyst Call held on 23rd May, 2023 on Company's financial performance for Q4 and FY ended 2022-2023 is made available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Result Financial Result - May 20, 2023
data.news_body: Outcome of Board meeting held on 20th May 2023 to approve standalone and consolidated financial result of the company for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2023.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Analyst / Investor Meet - Outcome
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 46(2)(oa) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 and with reference to our letter dated 24th January, 2023, we hereby inform that the audio recording of the Company's Investor/Analyst Call held on 31st January, 2023 on Company's financial performance for 9M & Q3 FY2022-2023 is made available on the website of the Company.

data.caption: Financial Result For The Nine Months And Quarter Ended 31St December 2022.
data.news_body:
We wish to inform you that at the meeting of the Board of
directors held on 27th January 2023, the board inter-alia, have approved and adopted Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company and the Limited Review Reports (Standalone and Consolidated) for the Third Quarter and Nine Months ended on 31st December, 2022.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 30Th September, 2022.
data.news_body: Dear Sir/Madam,Pursuant to the provisions of Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India(Listing Obligation and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended, we enclosedherewith the disclosure of Related Party Transactions for the half year ended on 30th September, 2022.Kindly take this in your records.
